summary: Following a horrifying experience with the occult in Africa, a schoolteacher moves to a small English village, only to discover that black magic resides there as well.
cast: Joan Fontaine|Kay Walsh|Alec McCowen|Ann Bell|Ingrid Boulting|John Collin|Michele Dotrice|Gwen Ffrangcon Davies|Duncan Lamont|Leonard Rossiter|Martin Stephens|Carmel McSharry|Viola Keats|Shelagh Fraser|Bryan Marshall|Yemi Goodman Ajibade|Kitty Atwood|John Barrett|Robert Charig|Harold Coyne|Roy Desmond|Catherine Finn|Prudence Hyman|Lizbeth Kent|Artro Morris|Willie Payne|Charles Rea|Ken Robson|Brian Todd|Don Vernon|Rudolph Walker|Terry Williams
title: Las brujas
